description: Navigate to Commonwealth Bank Town Hall Sydney Branch. The route begins on the Town Hall station platform and proceeds straight along the platform. The path follows the tiled floor past orange 'Town Hall' signs and benches, maintaining a straight line parallel to the tracks. The journey ends further down the platform near a lift, without exiting the station to reach the bank branch.

ground_truth.target_name: Commonwealth Bank Town Hall Sydney Branch

agent_refined_route: Head straight along the Town Hall station platform [48 m]
agent_concise_description: The route begins on the Town Hall station platform and proceeds straight along the platform. The path follows the tiled floor past orange 'Town Hall' signs and benches, maintaining a straight line parallel to the tracks. The journey ends further down the platform near a lift, without exiting the station to reach the bank branch.
